name: Stay Safe - Stay Home
description:
!!Keyboard required to play!!

Being at home means that people can't go out by themselves to buy what they need. Having less and less resources at home they need you to give.... well... more to throw at them what they need. They will await you at their windows! So be prepared!

This game was developed during the first StaySafe!Jam which started at the 27th of March 2020 and ended at the 29th of March 2020.

The theme of this Game Jam was Solidarity. 

SSJ Logo (c) Stay Safe! Jam
